import React from 'react' import '../../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id ) const {photo, title, desc, price, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize} = tour return ( <>
) } export default TourDetails
